001package org.relationlearn.util;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.util.Map;
005import java.util.Map.Entry;
006import org.relationlearn.classifiers.SVMClassifier;
007import org.relationlearn.filters.FilterGroup;
008import org.relationlearn.filters.SequentialFilterGroup;
009import org.relationlearn.model.RelationDigraph;
010import org.relationlearn.util.io.InputParser;
011import org.relationlearn.util.io.XMLFileParser;
012import weka.core.Instances;
013
014/**
015 * Utility class used to generate trained classifiers and store them in a file.
016 * 
017 * The call parameters are: &lttraining-file&gt &ltfilter-config-path&gt 
018 * &ltoutput-path&gt
019 * 
020 */
021public class ModelGenerator {
022    
023    private static InputParser parser;
024    private static FilterGroup filters;
025    private static InstanceGenerator generator;
026    private static SVMClassifier classifier;
027    
028    private static File configFile;
029    
030    private static Instances instances;
031    
032    private static String inputFile;
033    private static String baseConfigPath;
034    private static String baseOutPath;
035    
036    private ModelGenerator() {}
037    
038    public static void main(String args[]) throws Exception {
039        if(args.length != 3) {
040            System.err.println("Error in parameters, usage: "
041                    + "<input-file.xml> <filter-config-path> <output-path>");
042        } else {
043            inputFile = args[0];
044            baseConfigPath = args[1];
045            baseOutPath = args[2];
046            parser = new XMLFileParser();
047            Map<String, RelationDigraph> grahps = parser.parseInput(inputFile);
048            String gName;
049            for(Entry<String, RelationDigraph> graph : grahps.entrySet()) {
050                gName = graph.getKey();
051                configFile = new File(baseConfigPath + gName + ".xml");
052                if(configFile.exists()) {
053                    filters = new SequentialFilterGroup(gName, configFile);
054                    filters.addClassAttribute(null);
055                    generator = new InstanceGenerator(graph.getValue(), filters);
056                    instances = generator.getGraphInstances();
057                    classifier = new SVMClassifier();
058                    classifier.trainClassifier(instances);
059                    classifier.storeModel(baseOutPath + gName + ".model");
060                } else {
061                    System.err.println("Error could not find config file for: "
062                            + gName);
063                }
064                
065            }
066        }
067    }
068
069}
